Where to eat off I95

properties.name: Aquatica
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj931 Pulaski Hwy., HdG 21078931 Pulaski Hwy., HdG 21078 410-939-7686 email: achefswife@msn.com website: www.aquaticarestaurant.com An upscale, fine dining gourmet seafood restaurant that also features affordable fine wines. Seasonally changing menu. On-site parking, professional waitstaff, children\'s menu not available. Tue-Sun 2PM-9PM

properties.name: Java By The Bay
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj118 N. Washington St., HdG 21078118 N. Washington St., HdG 21078 410-939-0227 Charming cafe offering one stop shopping for all your coffee and tea needs. Coffee, tea, specialty drinks (hot and frozen) gift baskets and coffee by the pound. Mon-Fri 7:30AM-5:30PM; Sat 7:30AM-5PM; Sun 8AM-4PM

properties.name: La Cucina Italian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj 103 N. Washington St., HdG 21078410-939-1401 410-939-1402 Truly the best and freshest Italian food - beer, wine and liquor on premises. Catering & banquet room also available. Mon-Sat 10:30AM-11PM; Sun Noon-9PM

properties.name: Laurrapin Grille
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj209 N. Washington St., HdG 21078410-939-3663 Chef owned and operated. Where Northern California meets the Chesapeake Bay. Creative daily and nightly specials. Mon-Thur 11AM-10PM; Fri-Sat 11AM-midnight; Sun Brunch 10AM-2PM

properties.name: MacGregor's Restaurant & Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj 331 St. John St., HdG 21078331 St. John St., HdG 21078 410-939-3003 or 800-300-6319 website: www.macgregorsrestaurant.com All tables have water view. Award winning chefs. Open 7 days a week including holidays. Serving lunch, dinner, lite-fare and Sunday brunch. Open 7 days per week.

properties.name: Schuykill Expressway & 'Blue Route' I-476
properties.description: Posted by DougherjTake I-476 South to I-95 South. This is the way to get to our back route to Avalon and one choice for heading to Loyola.

properties.name: St. John Gourmet
properties.description: Posted by Dougherj210 St. John St., HdG 21078210 St. John St., HdG 21078 410-939-3663 website: www.stjohngourmet.com Chef owned and operated gourmet deli.
